overview.en: XMMT uses the concept of decentralization,based on the content of the blockchain,fully transparent and transparent to the readers,to jointly create a media platform with free speech and high quality development.In order to better promote the development of the platform,XMMT has set up a fair reward mechanism,so that each node that contributes to the ecology continues to benefit,and XMMT Token is used as a reward for these nodes.
overview.zh: XMMT使用去中心化理念,基于区块链上的内容完全公开透明的呈现在读者面前，共同打造一个言论自由，高质量发展的媒体平台。为了更好的推进平台发展，XMMT设置了公平的奖励机制，让每一个在生态内做贡献的节点不断收益，用 XMMT Token的方式作为对这些节点的奖励。我们这个代币不会增发，并且代币的拥有者已经超过了17000人。
